items.title: New Nato mission to bolster eastern flank after Russia drone incursion
items.description: Denmark, France and Germany will send jets to strengthen Poland's air defences after Russian drones flew into Polish territory.

items.title: Nigerian chef attempts to make world's largest pot of jollof rice
items.description: Hilda Baci and a team of assistants took several hours to complete the popular West African dish.

items.title: 'I will never let your legacy die' - Charlie Kirk's widow gives tearful address after shooting
items.description: Erika Kirk vows to fight on against 'evil-doers' in her first statement since her husband's death.

items.title: ICE agent shoots dead man who tried to drive at agents, officials say
items.description: The driver, Silverio Villegas-Gonzales, was pronounced dead in hospital shortly after the incident.

items.title: BBC reports from house linked to Charlie Kirk shooting suspect
items.description: Sitting outside was a grey car, similar to the model detectives said the suspect used to drive to the scene of the attack.
